title: 【BGM】科技与星系整合包（低配）
author: 小夜js
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小夜js 于 2020-5-17 14:14 编辑 
作者的话
作者第一次发帖，哪里不好请见谅MOD一共50多个mod工业2（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=515771&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E5%25B7%25A5%25E4%25B8%259A%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）连锁挖矿（网站没找到）NEI(https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=389937)R键整理（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=595267）不在有合成冲突（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=524091）抽屉（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=798307）高清修复（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=606019&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E9%25AB%2598%25E6%25B8%2585%25E4%25BF%25AE%25E5%25A4%258D%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）龙之进化（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=724610&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E9%25BE%2599%25E4%25B9%258B%25E8%25BF%259B%25E5%258C%2596%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）末影接口（没找到）末影存储（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=870812&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E6%259C%25AB%25E5%25BD%25B1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）更多使用设备（没找到）拔刀剑以及附属（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=726664&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E6%258B%2594%25E5%2588%2580%25E5%2589%2591%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）附属的链接就不列出来了超级工具（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=887912&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E8%25B6%2585%25E7%25BA%25A7%25E5%25B7%25A5%25E5%2585%25B7%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）等价交换（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=456675&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E7%25AD%2589%25E4%25BB%25B7%25E4%25BA%25A4%25E6%258D%25A2%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）砧板（没找到）加速火把（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=788894&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E5%258A%25A0%25E9%2580%259F%25E7%2581%25AB%25E6%258A%258A%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）无尽贪婪（https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=734399&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E6%2597%25A0%25E5%25B0%25BD%25E8%25B4%25AA%25E5%25A9%25AA%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D）还有许多模组去玩玩吧作者配置
